Posts.Content: hi simba  i am new to this site having just been diagnosed with bc  just had lumpectomy and full lymph removal  now just waiting to hear of the results  and learn my treatment plan,,  i hope you are well and coping with everything, i,m also a 20 a day ciggy monster  i,v been reading your post,s and finding inspiration from them to finally kick this awfull wead,  going to try the E ciggies  very soon  just wondering how your getting on ?  xx
Posts.Title: BC and smoking
